name: Feature 072: No-match project handling in unified switcher
description: User Story 3: Type ':nonexistent' to verify 'No matching projects' message

actions.description: Clean slate: Kill all existing windows

notes: User Story 3: When no projects match the query, show clear 'No matching projects' message
Manual test: Enter workspace mode, type ':nonexistent', verify preview shows no-match state
Expected preview: type='project', accumulated_chars='nonexistent', matched_project=null, no_match=true
Expected message: 'No matching projects' (clear error state)
Recovery: User can press Escape to cancel or backspace to modify query
Edge case: Very short queries (e.g., ':x') should still show no-match if no projects match
Note: This test validates the clean slate. Actual no-match handling requires manual validation or daemon simulation.
Architecture: No-match handling in emit_project_preview() (line 207: no_match = matched_project is None and len(accumulated_chars) > 0)
